name: Lotus: The Self-Made Witch
description:
Final exams day has arrived at St. Bertrude's Academy of Magic and Witchcraft, and there's no doubt that you're going to graduate today! You're The Self-Made Witch after all; everyone's rooting and cheering for you~

Except uh, Sage. They're just like that though. Don't worry too much, they're harmless. You'll graduate together, won't you?

---

Lotus: The Self-Made Witch is a small drag and drop crafting visual novel made as part of the tiny games to make magic with ✨ bundle. You can buy this and four other games for $10! Features:
  • Two witches of various genders
  • Over 4k words
  • Gorgeous custom character and background art
  • Original soundtrack
  • Use of the Ren'Py 3D Stage
  • 9 ingredients to work with, 27 unique potions to craft
  • 4 Endings
Team:

BáiYù - Producer, Writer, Programmer
Ronove - Character Designer, Character Artist
